title: Best of The Herd: 03/12/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 03/12/2019
description:
Colin thinks Adam Silver needs to step in and fix the Russell Westbrook situation before it gets worse between the fans and him.  He thinks an Odell Beckham Jr. trade is very much in play if the right team goes to get him.  He talks about the Jets and their pursuit of Le'Veon Bell.  Plus, former Ram, Eagle and Giant, Connor Barwin comes in studio to talk about playing for Sean McVay and why the Giants won't get rid of OBJ.  Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
